boardgame.name: Fealty
boardgame.description: The king has died with no clear successor! The players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;potential heirs all_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;are scrambling to put together their power bases by dispatching trusted agents and allies to garner support across the breadth of the kingdom. Nobody wants open warfare, but some conflict is sure to break out._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fealty is a game of positioning and territory control. Each turn, all players add one piece to the game board, with increasing constraints on placement as time goes on. Some pieces have an effect when brought into play. At the end of the game, all pieces place influence in order of speed, claiming territory and blocking slower opposing pieces. The player who has maneuvered his or her pieces to place the most influence onto the board wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2011 Golden Geek Best Abstract Board Game Nominee
2012 Golden Geek Best Abstract Board Game Nominee

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Played twice, excellent condition.

One of the first 100 copies sold at Origins. These copies were sold before a large run was printed. Great shape. This comes in a white box with Fealty logo label on the lid. Triplets auction for winner georgewrasmussen

Played only once, perfect condition. This was from Kickstarter if that makes a difference. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $11.35 for USPS Priority Mail. International shipping will be actual price plus USD$5.00 (sorry, it is a much bigger hassle on my end, plus I need to provide the box). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal. I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.
New in Shrink. Buyer only pays actual shipping. Send me your postal code for an estimate. Combined shipping available. Thanks.
For purchase by larryjrice only. Shipping via USPS flat rate priority w/ delivery confirmation.

Opened and punched out but never played with. I am the original owner it was kept in a smoke free environment. There may be minor shelf wear. In great condition with all pieces. I am selling several other games so check them out, if you buy multiple games you can save on shipping costs.
